data.persona: I attend the church every week and say my prayers dutifully. I always put coins in the poor box. I light a candle for my departed mother.
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's a goddess, a chair, and an ornament here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must have this ornament blessed
data.mid_motivation: I need to pray to the Goddess
data.long_motivation: I must collect the Goddess blessed ornament to ensure my mother's safe travel through the underworld

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get blessed ornament from Goddess' hands
